description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Tom Yum Noodle Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Tom Yum Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 90 g Mama Shrimp (Tom Yum) Flavour instant noodles

recipeInstructions.text: Add chicken, pak choy and noodles, and cook for 2 minutes or until chicken and noodles are cooked through. Stir in lime juice. Divide soup among bowls. Top with chilli and coriander.
Add chicken, pak choy and noodles, and cook for 2 minutes or until chicken and noodles are cooked through. Stir in lime juice. Divide soup among bowls. Top with chilli and coriander.
